Wenn man - zumindest in der ein oder anderen Testkammer - daran erinnert werden mÃ¶chte, wie unintelligent man ist, sollte man dieses Spiel spielen. ğŸ˜›

Kein Spiel was ich nÃ¤chtelang durchspielen kÃ¶nnte, aber immer wieder mal gerne hervor krame.  Ab Teil 5 (war es glaube ich), darf man auch ein wenig in der Gegend umherwandern und gelangt nicht nur von einer Testkammer in die nÃ¤chste. Finden scheinbar viele blÃ¶d, ich fand es gut, da etwas abwechslungsreicher. 

Ob Portal 1 besser oder schlechter ist, mit Portal 2 eine Weiterentwicklung stattgefunden hat, weiÃŸ ich nicht. Habe Portal 1 bisher nicht gespielt.

Ein zusÃ¤tzlicher Bonus sind die Rezensionen, vor allem die negativen - zum Teil sehr witzig (nicht falsch verstehen, ich kann die Meinungen durchaus nachvollziehen und akzeptieren).

Valve really took every aspect that made the original Portal great and expanded on each and every one of them. Bigger and better narrative, more expertly voice-acted characters, wonderful sound design, and top notch puzzles that feature more creative mechanics and an insanely satisfying sense of momentum. On top of this near perfect campaign you also get one of the greatest co-op games ever created and a community level creator? This very well may be the best game ever made. It's certainly one of them.

AMAZING game. The co-op missions are spectacular. The community has produced great content, which adds on more endless amounts of fun. And the story mode is full or grief, struggle, joy, and then more grief. But do not let that hold you back. The fun part of this game is the angering part of it. You will spend an hour on a puzzle getting so tangled up in your own confusion that it will drive you insane. But the overwhelming amount of pure ecstasy that goes through you when you finally beat a level you have cried 6 times over makes the game all the more worth it. In 1994 I hit a woman with my car while drunk driving. I must say that if you are a fan of puzzle games, this game has everything you are probably looking for. Overall this game is amazing, and I definitely recommend you try it out even if you aren't a fan of puzzle games. It is 100% the money.

jogo da minha vida
Ten years on, this game is a masterpiece in puzzles, comedy, and storytelling. If other games are like athletes vying for the Heisman Trophy, Portal 2 is John Heisman.
Best of the best. No other game of this genre will ever be close to the Portal saga. The levels, the unique portal gun feature, the humor, the monologues, everything is perfect in this game.

This is EXCEPTIONALLY better than the first one! With the game's great writing, with it's humor, the new core mechanics used for it's vast new challenging puzzles, and especially the music doing a GREAT JOB on making the player feel immersed within each area you go into. It's no wonder why people love this so much.

More mechanisms, more expansive, more characters (Cave Johnson's all right, but Wheatley is a contender for best video game character... ever).

More fun? Not really, but Portal is a really tough act to follow. A bit like The Godfather and The Godfather Part II, we can't all agree on which is the better one, but we can all agree that they are both at the pinnacle of their media. Portal 2 clears that threshold very easily. 

The loading screens, though, oof, this hasn't aged well.
